member.name: M:PayFast.Base.PayFastApiBase.Ping(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Used to check if the API is responding to requests.
member.param: The token received from PayFast. See PayFast Return variables Documentation for more information
Pass in true to test against the sandbox. This parameter, when true appends the required '?testing=true' value to the generated query string.
member.exception: Thrown when the returned StatusCode != HttpStatusCode.OK (200)

member.name: M:PayFast.Base.PayFastApiBase.Cancel(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This will cancel a subscription entirely.
member.param: The token received from PayFast. See PayFast Return variables Documentation for more information
Pass in true to test against the sandbox. This parameter, when true appends the required '?testing=true' value to the generated query string.
member.exception: Thrown when the returned StatusCode != HttpStatusCode.OK (200)

member.name: M:PayFast.Base.PayFastApiBase.GenerateSignature(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}[])
member.summary: This method will generate the signature for the request See PayFast API Signature Generation Documentation for more information.

member.name: T:PayFast.PayFastAdHoc
member.summary: This class is intended to be used for adhoc payments See PayFast Ad-Hoc Payments Documentation for more information.

member.name: M:PayFast.PayFastAdHoc.Fetch(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a JSON object containing the subscription details.
member.param: The token received from PayFast. See PayFast Return variables Documentation for more information
Pass in true to test against the sandbox. This parameter, when true appends the required '?testing=true' value to the generated query string.
member.exception: Thrown when the returned StatusCode != HttpStatusCode.OK (200)

member.name: M:PayFast.PayFastAdHoc.Charge(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Charge an ad hoc subscription based on token.
member.param: The token received from PayFast. See PayFast Return variables Documentation for more information
Future recurring amount for the subscription. In ZAR and amount in cents and not X.XX
The name of the item being charged for. (100 chars)
Pass in true to test against the sandbox. This parameter, when true appends the required '?testing=true' value to the generated query string.
member.exception: Thrown when the returned StatusCode != HttpStatusCode.OK (200)

member.name: M:PayFast.PayFastAdHoc.Charge(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Charge an ad hoc subscription based on token.
member.param: The token received from PayFast. See PayFast Return variables Documentation for more information
Future recurring amount for the subscription. In ZAR and amount in cents and not X.XX
The name of the item being charged for. (100 chars)
The description of the item being charged for. (255 chars)
Pass in true to test against the sandbox. This parameter, when true appends the required '?testing=true' value to the generated query string.

member.name: M:PayFast.PayFastNotify.#ctor
member.summary: This constructor does not allow for a argument because it is intended to be called by the mvc model binder. If a passphrase is being used, make a call to SetPassPhrase(string passPhrase) on this class after it has been passed in by the model binder See PayFast Return Variable Page Documentation for more information. See PayFast ITN Page Documentation for more information.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastNotify.m_payment_id
member.summary: Unique payment ID on the merchant’s system.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastNotify.pf_payment_id
member.summary: Unique transaction ID on PayFast.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastNotify.payment_status
member.summary: The status of the payment.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastNotify.item_name
member.summary: The name of the item being charged for.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastNotify.item_description
member.summary: The description of the item being charged for.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastNotify.amount_gross
member.summary: The total amount which the payer paid.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastNotify.amount_fee
member.summary: The total in fees which was deducated from the amount.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastNotify.amount_net
member.summary: The net amount credited to the receiver’s account.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastNotify.custom_str1
member.summary: Number 1 in a series of 5 custom string variables (custom_str1, custom_str2…) which can be used by the merchant as pass-through variables. They will be posted back to the merchant at the completion of the transaction.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastNotify.custom_str2
member.summary: Number 2 in a series of 5 custom string variables (custom_str1, custom_str2…) which can be used by the merchant as pass-through variables. They will be posted back to the merchant at the completion of the transaction.

member.summary: Number 3 in a series of 5 custom string variables (custom_str1, custom_str2…) which can be used by the merchant as pass-through variables. They will be posted back to the merchant at the completion of the transaction.

member.summary: Number 5 in a series of 5 custom string variables (custom_str1, custom_str2…) which can be used by the merchant as pass-through variables. They will be posted back to the merchant at the completion of the transaction.

member.summary: The Merchant ID as given by the PayFast system. Used to uniquely identify the receiver’s account.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastNotify.billing_date
member.summary: The date from which future subscription payments will be made.

member.name: M:PayFast.PayFastRequest.#ctor
member.summary: This constructor is used when a passphrase is not setup or configured See PayFast Confirm Page Documentation for more information.

member.name: M:PayFast.PayFastRequest.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: This constructor is used when a passphrase has been configured See PayFast Confirm Page Documentation for more information.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.merchant_id
member.summary: The Merchant ID as given by the PayFast system. Used to uniquely identify the receiving account. This can be found on the merchant’s settings page.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.merchant_key
member.summary: The Merchant Key as given by the PayFast system. Used to uniquely identify the receiving account. This provides an extra level of certainty concerning the correct account as both the ID and the Key must be correct in order for the transaction to proceed. This can be found on the merchant’s settings page.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.return_url
member.summary: The URL where the user is returned to after payment has been successfully taken. Default: PayFast homepage

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.cancel_url
member.summary: The URL where the user should be redirected should they choose to cancel their payment while on the PayFast system. Default: PayFast homepage

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.notify_url
member.summary: The URL which is used by PayFast to post the Instant Transaction Notifications (ITNs) for this transaction.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.name_first
member.summary: The buyer’s first name.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.name_last
member.summary: The buyer’s last name.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.email_address
member.summary: The buyer’s email address

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.m_payment_id
member.summary: Unique payment ID on the merchant’s system.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.amount
member.summary: The amount which the payer must pay in ZAR.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.item_name
member.summary: The name of the item being charged for.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.item_description
member.summary: The description of the item being charged for.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.email_confirmation
member.summary: Whether to send email confirmation to the merchant of the transaction. Email confirmation is automatically sent to the payer.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.confirmation_address
member.summary: The address to send the confirmation email to.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.subscription_type
member.summary: The subscription type sets the recurring billing type to either a subscription or an ad hoc agreement.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.billing_date
member.summary: The date from which future subscription payments will be made.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.recurring_amount
member.summary: Future recurring amount for the subscription. Defaults to the ‘amount’ value if not set.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.frequency
member.summary: The cycle period.

member.name: P:PayFast.PayFastRequest.cycles
member.summary: The number of payments/cycles that will occur for this subscription. Set to 0 for infinity.

member.name: M:PayFast.PayFastRequest.ToString
member.summary: generates the query string as per the PayFast specifications. PayFast also refers to this string as the GET string.

member.name: T:PayFast.PayFastSubscription
member.summary: This class is intended to be used for subscriptions See PayFast Subscription Documentation for more information.

Pass in true to test against the sandbox. This parameter, when true appends the required '?testing=true' value to the generated query string.

member.name: M:PayFast.PayFastSubscription.Pause(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 'Freeze' a subscription, for a duration indicated by the 'cycles' variable.
member.param: The token received from PayFast. See PayFast Return variables Documentation for more information
Pass in true to test against the sandbox. This parameter, when true appends the required '?testing=true' value to the generated query string.
The number of payments/cycles that will occur for this subscription. Set to 0 for infinity.

member.name: M:PayFast.PayFastSubscription.Update(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{PayFast.BillingFrequency},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean)
member.summary: This allows for multiple subscription values to be updated. If you do not wish to change a value, set the parameter to null, or do not pass in a value as it will default to null
member.param: The token received from PayFast. See PayFast Return variables Documentation for more information
The number of payments/cycles that will occur for this subscription. Set to 0 for infinity.
The cycle period.
The date from which the cycle will be calculated
Future recurring amount for the subscription. In ZAR and amount in cents and not X.XX
Pass in true to test against the sandbox. This parameter, when true appends the required '?testing=true' value to the generated query string.
member.exception: Thrown when the returned StatusCode != HttpStatusCode.OK (200)
